name: OOM-9 (V)
Lore: 'Officer battle droid who acted as a unit leader in the attack against the Gungans. Required advice from the Droid Control Ship in order to defeat the Gungan energy shield.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. While at a battleground, you lose no force to Amidala and your force generation is +1 for each of opponent''s non-battlegrounds on table (and cards stacked on their Epic Events).',
